About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

SUMMARY

Hi! I'm André, a Motion Designer turned Developer. Recently moved back to Brazil after living in South Africa, where I interned as a designer and was able to gain experience in the field. In my time back in Brazil I worked as a Motion Designer in video production agency.

My journey with development started with writing code in JavaScript to automate some of my animation processes and since then haven't looked back. I have attended Front-End development courses and am always watching courses online to learn more about development, I have also started college to broaden my understanding. Check out some of the places I have studied before and the skills I have obtained below.
